title: Pheasant dumplings with squash broth and pumpkin oil
description: Embrace the flavours of autumn with game dumplings in a soothing squash broth.
ingredients: 6 sprigs thyme, leaves picked and chopped
1 tbsp cornflour mixed with cold water to make a thin paste
2 kabocha or acorn squash, peeled and chopped into small cubes
1 orange, finely grated zest and juice
